hooks.command: INPUT=$(cat); FP=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); case "$FP" in *.md) grep -oE '`(docs/[^`]+|[A-Z]+\.md|\.claude/skills/[^`]+)`' "$FP" 2>/dev/null | tr -d '`' | while read ref; do [ ! -f "$ref" ] && echo "WARNING: 断链引用 $ref 在 $FP 中"; done ;; esac; true

INPUT=$(cat); FP=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); case "$FP" in */reports/*.md) case "$FP" in */reports/*/[A-Z]*) ;; *) echo "WARNING: 铁律E违反 — 报告 $FP 未放入 reports/{TICKER}/ 子目录" ;; esac ;; esac; case "$FP" in */CLAUDE.md|CLAUDE.md) lines=$(wc -l < "$FP" 2>/dev/null); if [ "$lines" -gt 400 ]; then echo "CRITICAL: CLAUDE.md ${lines}行 (上限400)。提取到docs/"; elif [ "$lines" -gt 250 ]; then echo "WARNING: CLAUDE.md ${lines}行 (目标<250)"; fi ;; */reports/*Deep_Research*|*/reports/*Analysis*) chars=$(wc -m < "$FP" 2>/dev/null); tags=$(grep -coE '\[A:|\[B:|\[P:|\[E:' "$FP" 2>/dev/null || echo 0); if [ "$chars" -gt 10000 ] && [ "$tags" -lt 15 ]; then echo "WARNING: 数据标注不足 — ${tags}个标注/${chars}字符 (要求≥15/万字)"; fi ;; *.md|*.yaml|*.yml) lines=$(wc -l < "$FP" 2>/dev/null); [ "$lines" -gt 500 ] && echo "WARNING: $FP 有 ${lines} 行，考虑拆分以避免 File Too Large 错误" ;; esac; true
